thread.title: Final Thoughts: It is your President’s Day and the snowflakes are attempting to alter reality – TheBlaze
thread.title_full: Final Thoughts: It is your President’s Day and the snowflakes are attempting to alter reality – TheBlaze

title: Final Thoughts: It is your President’s Day and the snowflakes are attempting to alter reality – TheBlaze
text:
Tweet 
It’s President’s Day and the snowflakes are upset again because “It’s Not My President” Donald Trump is in office. 
In Tomi’s “Final Thoughts” she describes the snowflake’s attempts at altering reality by holding yet another rally. She believes if these people spent half or even a quarter of that time on something productive they might not be complaining about income equality, student loans or how unfair life is. 
To see more from Tomi, visit her channel on TheBlaze and watch full episodes of “Tomi” live weeknights from 7–8pm ET or anytime on-demand at TheBlaze TV . Rate this clip
